summary: A public defender enlists Charlie to exonerate one of his clients, an ex-con falsely accused of bank robbery and murder, scheduled for execution in nine days.
cast: Sidney Toler|Mantan Moreland|Ben Carter|Benson Fong|Teala Loring|George Holmes|Joyce Compton|John Eldredge|Russell Hicks|Tim Ryan|Janet Shaw|Edward Earle|Ray Walker|Milton Parsons|Edna Holland|Anthony Warde|George Eldredge|Meyer Grace|Chet Brandenburg|Frank Marlowe|Mathew McCue|Tom Quinn|William Ruhl
title: Charlie Chan en Alcatraz
